title: Joy Monument Company recently completed this beautiful memorial for the Sheehan family in Floydsburg...

attachments.displayName: Joy Monument Company recently completed this beautiful memorial for the Sheehan family in Floydsburg Cemetery located in Crestwood, Ky. This design was created from the Sheehan's love of family and nature. The two small waves becoming one on the horizon is symbolic of their two families joining as one when Mr. & Mrs. Sheehan were married. It also represents their love of water from family trips to the lake and beach. The eagle is present across a wide range of beliefs or philosophies. For the Sheehans, this pair of soaring Eagles represent spiritual protection, carry prayers, and bring strength, courage, wisdom, and healing to their family and friends.
